issue.title: [BE] - metadata relations definition : filter on status does not work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the BE screen "relations" in CATALOG, you have access to the list of all relations defined in easySDI.

If ones want to filter on "status", it does not work = you still have all status displayed.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This has been fixed some time ago (unable to find issue number)
